comment._content: Great dog. And courageous as they often are.

comment.author: 19388285@N00
comment._content: So very sad .... I wonder if the grave stone is still there...

comment.author: 23943560@N05
comment._content: Dogs are such great companions ..... I was hiking in the mountains of Idaho along a closed and overgrown logging road when I came upon a grave marker that  had a piece of paper enclosed in pastic nailed to it ... on the paper children had wrote :The best dog in the whole world".  They buried him in a favorite spot, as we were many miles from housing.
